text: @Nigel_Farage With the rest of the country embattled by COVID19 and our NHS and carers comprising of countless immigrants leading the fight, you're cutting a sad and lonely figure on that beach Nige. Why not go home, have a nice brew, and reflect on how irrelevant you and your ilk have become.
